about_the_game: The Space Otter Charlie Official Soundtrack is the perfect compilation of all the space-y synth-y tracks you love from otter space. Lose yourself in music by Ed Allard; 11 tracks full of heart-pumping tunes to jam to as you jetpack your way through decrepit space stations and shoot angry robots. BONUS TRACK: Also includes a special rock otter version of the main theme by Stemage, Featuring Mason Lieberman!
detailed_description: The Space Otter Charlie Official Soundtrack is the perfect compilation of all the space-y synth-y tracks you love from otter space. Lose yourself in music by Ed Allard; 11 tracks full of heart-pumping tunes to jam to as you jetpack your way through decrepit space stations and shoot angry robots. BONUS TRACK: Also includes a special rock otter version of the main theme by Stemage, Featuring Mason Lieberman!
